translations: 法士达（一种墨西哥食物）

sentences.sentence: Fajitas! Be careful! Very hot plate! Very hot!
sentences.translation: 法加它！ 当心，盘子很烫，盘子很烫！！

sentences.sentence: Or make fajitas using extra-firm tofu rather than chicken.
sentences.translation: 另外你也可用专用豆腐而非鸡肉来做fajitas(注：一种墨西哥菜)。

sentences.sentence: You can make patties, cook steaks, or cook them in strips like fajitas.
sentences.translation: 你可以做成小馅饼，煮排骨，或者把他们煮成例如春卷状的肉条。
